name: Crosmorf Adventures
description:
A World Adventure!

This game warns you if you do not take proper care and precautions.

You are NOT the hero, you are the villain called CROSMORF!

In addition to the adventures of the stages, you will be challenged by the bosses defending each country. Defeating them will be a task that will require a strategy that only you can create! Controlling your ammunition is very important. Everyone wants to defeat you, because you are a freak to society.

The enemies like to follow the tradition of each location, so how will they behave in each country? In addition, each place has different enemies from the previous nation, find out what they are.

The graphics report on the wonders of the places through which CROSMORF passes, they are magnificent!

Will this villain take over the world? There will be an unexpected end for him. Play and check it out.


Hint: Some levels are rumored to have secrets, full of bonuses. Could it be?
